Package fr.rclens.projetpointeuse.facade

Interface EmployeeManager

All Known Implementing Classes:
Company
public interface EmployeeManager
Entity class to represent the interface for our source application (the company)

  • Method Details

    • createEmployee

      IEmployee createEmployee(String name, String firstname)
      create and return a new IEmployee with the given name and firstname
      Parameters:
      name - the name (lastname) of the employee
      firstname - the firstname of the employee
      Returns:
      the IEmployee newly created

      Returns:
      the IDepartment newly created

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the IEmployee with the given UUID or null if it doesn't exist

      List<IEmployee> getAllEmployeesFromDepartment(IDepartment Param)
      return the list of all the IEmployee in the given departement
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the list of all the IEmployee in the given departement
